message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $180 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm interested in the product but would only be able to pay $120 for it.  Let me know if you're willing to come down to that.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $160 is still a little more than I can afford.  I'm firm on $120.  If you're not able to go that low, I'll have to go with another seller.
